text: We can’t deny that computer is very important to human life nowaday.
But there are still many complex problem that can’t be solved by classical computer, even we try to add more computing power.
A new way of computing is needed.
So quantum computing was invented using modern physics theory like quantum physics,
and it change the way that computer work completely.
In classical computer, smallest unit to store data is bit, which can be either 0 or 1 state.
So the only way that we can change bit state is bitflip, from 0 to 1 or 1 to 0.
But for quantum computer, we use “Qubit” which can be represented with a sphere.
Qubit state can be 0, 1 and also any point in between on the sphere.
We can change the qubit state by rotating it around the sphere in any angle and direction.
Operators that rotate qubit state are called “Quantum Gates”
This is qubit composer where you can apply basic gates to the qubit.
Let’s apply Hadamard gate by drag it to the timeline.
Look at the qubit, now it is neither 0 or 1 but in between.
We called this state as a “Superposition”
You can click on any gate to see the description and preview an effect on the qubit.
Let’s add appropriate gates to move qubit state toward blinking point!
Now you know how to change qubit state but in order to get qubit value,
a measurement operation needed to be applied.
Measurement is an indeterministic operation
which make superposition state collapse to either 0 or 1 with some probability value.
We will do measurement for 100 times on the same qubit state to see the probability of getting 0 and 1.
As you can see, the chance of getting 1 and 0 is related to the distance from qubit state before a measurement.
With qubit, researcher can develop quantum algorithms to solve some particular problems
in more efficient way when comparing to classical method.
Quantum computer hardware is still under development, but it can not replace classical computer.
It was built to tackle different kind of problems which might take human kind to a new discovery.
